title.narrative: OUTPUT 4: EPAH, URGENCE, PREP.& REPONSE

description.narrative: By 2016, DINEPA and its partners have adequate means and technical skills to reduce disaster risks vulnerability and to provide an adequate and coordinated response in emergency situations, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, women and their families in rural and poor urban areas, especially the most vulnerable, have gained equitable and sustainable access to safe water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) services as well as to hygiene education
